translation.en: It was. So what do we got?
translation.ja: そう　大黒星 今回は？

translation.en: I got an unknown number of suspects
translation.ja: 犯人グループの人数と人質の数は不明

translation.en: and an unknown number of hostages in a bank.
translation.ja: 犯人グループの人数と人質の数は不明 野次馬はドッサリ中の様子は何も分からん

translation.en: And about a million spectators, and I can't see shit inside, so I'm kind of busy.
translation.ja: 野次馬はドッサリ中の様子は何も分からん

translation.en: - I understand. - The way this works, Mr. Frazier, is I deal with Mr. Grossman.
translation.ja: 今日もグロスマンが来るんだろ？

translation.en: So if you need anything, you can speak with him, okay?
translation.ja: 情報は彼から聞け

translation.en: No, it's not okay, Captain.
translation.ja: お言葉ですが―

translation.en: Detective Grossman is away on vacation, so Detective Frazier is the big dick today, all right?
translation.ja: グロスマンは休暇を取ってて今回は私の担当なんです

translation.en: Now, if you need anything, you can speak to me, all right?
translation.ja: 情報は私(･)が(･) あ(･)な(･)た(･)に(･)伝えます

translation.en: Guess it'll have to be.
translation.ja: 仕方ない

translation.en: That's the way it's gonna be. You got vests for us?
translation.ja: 我々の防弾チョッキは？

translation.en: - Berk? - Yo! - Get these guys some vests. - Okay.
translation.ja: バーク！　防弾チョッキを出せ

translation.en: Check 'em into the command log.
translation.ja: 状況の説明も

translation.en: I'm gonna get out of your hair and let you get control of this crime scene, okay?
translation.ja: 我々は邪魔でしょうから―

translation.en: - Let me know when you're ready with a detailed briefing. - Okay.
translation.ja: 態勢が整うのを待ちます

translation.en: We're gonna take a walk down to the diner. Don't go in the bank without calling us first, all right?
translation.ja: 外のカフェにいます行動に出る前に連絡を

translation.en: - Okay? Good to see you again. - All right.
translation.ja: 外のカフェにいます行動に出る前に連絡を それじゃ…

translation.en: Shouldn't we be in there?
translation.ja: なぜ出るんだ？

translation.en: Let's give him some time, see what he does. Come on.
translation.ja: 奴に準備する時間を与える

translation.en: Until he secures his position, gets the physical layout, he'll only dump on us.
translation.ja: 我々が そばにいると苛立つ

translation.en: Show starts, he'll call us. Trust me, I've seen him work.
translation.ja: 奴が呼ぶのを待つんだ

translation.en: - Your call, Keith. - You get that for me? I guess it is, isn't it?
translation.ja: 分かった そういうものさ

translation.en: That's one thing I learned from Grossman. These guys don't have much respect for what we do.
translation.ja: あいつらは俺たちを煙たがる

translation.en: - How do you mean? - For them it's a tactical situation. Us being here means there's a mental side to it that they don't get.
translation.ja: 機動作戦には慣れてるが心理作戦を理解できないのさ

translation.en: - Told you you could handle this. - Yeah.
translation.ja: 読みが深い

translation.en: Keep waiting for someone higher up on the food chain to show up and say, "Here's what we do."
translation.ja: ベテラン上司がいて命令してくれりゃラクだがね

translation.en: What happened at the hospital?
translation.ja: 病院事件って？

translation.en: Guy shot himself, shot his girlfriend. Thank you.
translation.ja: 犯人(ホシ)が恋人を撃ち 自殺した

translation.en: ( wheezing, muttering ) I've got...
translation.ja: 言ったろ？　俺は…

translation.en: heart-- heart condition.
translation.ja: 心臓が…心臓が悪いんだ

translation.en: Get up.
translation.ja: 立て

translation.en: - Put down your fucking weapon! Don't move! - Don't shoot!
translation.ja: 銃を下ろせ！ 撃つな！

translation.en: - Don't move! - Don't shoot! I'm Herman Gluck!
translation.ja: 撃つな！

translation.en: Down on your knees, now!
translation.ja: ひざをつくんだ！

translation.en: They sent me out here! They sent me out here!
translation.ja: 奴らに “こう言え”と言われた

translation.en: - They said stay away! - Cuff him!
translation.ja: “近づくな”

translation.en: If you come near the bank, he'll throw out two dead bodies!
translation.ja: “近づいたら人質を２人殺す”

translation.en: - Who said this? - Who? I don't know who. - The guy with the big fucking gun, that's who. - On your feet!
translation.ja: デカい銃を持った奴がそう言ったんだよ

translation.en: - Calm down! - Am I gonna be on TV?
translation.ja: 俺 テレビに？

translation.en: Yeah, a big star. Let's go! Come on!
translation.ja: 大スターだよ

translation.en: Was it a time when I thought I might not see my family again?
translation.ja: “家族に会えないと思ったか？”

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I thought about it. I mean, at first I wasn't...
translation.ja: もちろん思ったさ 銃を突きつけられた時は頭が真っ白だったがね

translation.en: it was too much to think about at that point,
translation.ja: 銃を突きつけられた時は頭が真っ白だったがね

translation.en: you know, with a gun in your face, but after a while,
translation.ja: 銃を突きつけられた時は頭が真っ白だったがね その後 こう思った

translation.en: you know, I thought about...
translation.ja: その後 こう思った

translation.en: yeah-- my wife, you know, not seeing my wife again.
translation.ja: “女房と これきり会えないかもしれない”

translation.en: My kids-- I got a 10-year-old son, 17-year-old daughter.
translation.ja: 子供たちにもね10才の息子と17才の娘がいる

translation.en: Yeah, I thought about it, man. What you think?
translation.ja: もちろん そう思ったさ

translation.en: Those my babies.
translation.ja: 俺の子供たちだ

translation.en: Beautiful.
translation.ja: すばらしい！

translation.en: Miss White, I want you to rest assured,
translation.ja: ホワイトさん　ご安心を

translation.en: my only intention is to spend time in your wonderful city
translation.ja: 私は このすばらしい街で暮らしたいだけなんです

translation.en: and to enjoy all that it has to offer. And no business with your uncle?
translation.ja: 私は このすばらしい街で暮らしたいだけなんです 伯父様は？

translation.en: In truth, I have very little to do with him these days.
translation.ja: 伯父は一切無関係です

translation.en: I'm told you haven't seen him in nine years. Is that right?
translation.ja: ９年 会ってないのね？

translation.en: - You're extremely well informed. - I have to be. Yes.
translation.ja: よくご存じだ 調べたの

translation.en: I have a Mr. Arthur Case on the phone for you.
translation.ja: ケイスさんから お電話が

translation.en: We'll need to end this here. I'm gonna need a copy of your purchase agreement,
translation.ja: じゃ これで 不動産購入契約書と抵当権設定の申請書コピーを

translation.en: your mortgage application and the other documentation, and I'll be in touch.
translation.ja: 不動産購入契約書と抵当権設定の申請書コピーを

translation.en: - Thank you, Miss White. - Right this way, sir.
translation.ja: よろしく

translation.en: - Arthur Case? You sure? - That's what he said.
translation.ja: アーサー･ケイス？

translation.en: He said his name, just like that? It wasn't his secretary saying he was on the line?
translation.ja: 秘書でなく本人が出てるの？

translation.en: - No, ma'am. - All right. Put him through.
translation.ja: つないで

translation.en: - This is Madeline White. - Miss White, I'm Arthur Case.
translation.ja: ホワイトです アーサー･ケイスだ

translation.en: - Good morning, Mr. Case. - Have we met formally?
translation.ja: ケイスさん 前に会ったかな？

translation.en: No, sir, I don't believe we have.
translation.ja: いえ　まだ正式には…

translation.en: Yet you're always turning up
translation.ja: うちの別荘の独立記念日の―

translation.en: at my July 4th parties in Southampton.
translation.ja: パーティーに毎年来るだろう？

translation.en: Yes, we know some of the same people.
translation.ja: 共通の知り合いがいるんです

translation.en: It seems. I'll come right to the point.
translation.ja: そうらしい　それより本題だ

translation.en: I have a small problem which requires someone
translation.ja: ちょっと問題が起こって―

translation.en: with very special skills and complete discretion.
translation.ja: 有能で口の堅い弁護士を探している

translation.en: Are you such a person, or have I been misinformed?
translation.ja: 君はその条件に合う弁護士だとか

translation.en: Go on.
translation.ja: 先を どうぞ

translation.en: Can I pick you up in front of your office building in five minutes?
translation.ja: ５分後に迎えに行きたい

translation.en: - I'll be downstairs. - Thank you.
translation.ja: 正面玄関で

translation.en: They had a kind of genius plan
translation.ja: あいつら― 天才的な計画を立ててた

translation.en: for throwing us out of whack
translation.ja: 天才的な計画を立ててた こっちを混乱させて―

translation.en: and depriving us of any kind of way of controlling ourselves.
translation.ja: こっちを混乱させて― 冷静になる機会を与えない

translation.en: They were-- they were very...
translation.ja: 絶対に妥協せず―

translation.en: insistent and yet strangely detached.
translation.ja: でも どこか超然としてた

translation.en: All I know is that they called each other a variation of "Steve."
translation.ja: “スティーブ”に似た名で呼び合ってた

translation.en: Steven, Steve-O, Stevie...
translation.ja: “スティーブン”“スティーブ Ｏ(オー)”―

translation.en: - And they called you what? - They didn't call me anything.
translation.ja: “スティービー” 君は？ 俺は仲間じゃない

translation.en: They just told me-- - You're lying to me.
translation.ja: 俺は仲間じゃない ウソをつくな！　正直に話せ

translation.en: Tell me the truth. Now, you're lying to me.
translation.ja: ウソをつくな！　正直に話せ

translation.en: Look at me and tell me the truth.
translation.ja: 正直に話せ

translation.en: They had AK-47s out, four of them.
translation.ja: ４人はＡＫ‐47を持ってた

translation.en: - You know a lot about guns? - No, I don't know anything about guns except--
translation.ja: 詳しいな 銃のことなんか

translation.en: - You know they had an AK-47. - Everybody knows what an AK-47 is.
translation.ja: ＡＫ‐47を知ってる それは誰でも知ってる

translation.en: - Everybody? - Anybody who's ever watched
translation.ja: 誰でも？ アクション映画を見てる奴ならね

translation.en: a decent action movie would.
translation.ja: アクション映画を見てる奴ならね

translation.en: - You ever rob a bank before? - Are you kidding?
translation.ja: 銀行を襲った？ 冗談じゃない！ヘンなこと言うな

translation.en: Me, rob a bank? No.
translation.ja: 冗談じゃない！ヘンなこと言うな

translation.en: - Never stole a dollar? - Never.
translation.ja: 盗みは？ ない

translation.en: - Never? - Not ever! You know what?
translation.ja: 一度もない

translation.en: That one time. That one time, that one time.
translation.ja: だが あの時は？ 一度 ５セント玉を盗んだ

translation.en: I stole a nickel from my grandmother's pocketbook once.
translation.ja: 一度 ５セント玉を盗んだ 祖母の財布から

translation.en: She was Polish. I used to go up to her and say...
translation.ja: 祖母はポーランド人で俺は よくね(･)だ(･)っ(･)た(･)

translation.en: One day, I opened her pocketbook
translation.ja: ある日 財布を開けたら５セント玉が入ってた

translation.en: and there was a nickel there. I took it.
translation.ja: ある日 財布を開けたら５セント玉が入ってた 人の金を盗んだのはそれ一度だ

translation.en: That was the only thing I ever took.
translation.ja: 人の金を盗んだのはそれ一度だ

translation.en: Look, Detective, I didn't mean to give you a hard time back there.
translation.ja: さっきは悪かった

translation.en: Forget about it. What's the story, Captain?
translation.ja: いいんです　それで？

translation.en: Well, the hostage they let go was Herman Gluck, 73.
translation.ja: 解放されたのは73才の老人だ

translation.en: He was having chest pains. Paramedics have him.
translation.ja: 胸の痛みを訴えた

translation.en: They told him to say that if any cops came near the door
translation.ja: 犯人らは“警官がドアに― 近づいたら人質を２人 殺す”と

translation.en: they'd throw out two dead bodies.
translation.ja: 近づいたら人質を２人 殺す”と

translation.en: He thinks there's four perps. Says they came in dressed as painters.
translation.ja: 犯人グループは４人でペンキ職人を装ってたそうだ

translation.en: There's a video system in the bank.
translation.ja: 銀行のビデオ･モニターを―

translation.en: We're working on getting the download from Manhattan Trust's central security office, but it'll take a while.
translation.ja: ダウンロードするよう警備会社に命じてある

translation.en: We got the block locked up. I got men in the windows.
translation.ja: 付近のビルは立ち退(の)き完了

translation.en: We're checking on the sewers with DEP.
translation.ja: 下水道の点検も進行中だ

translation.en: - What about the phones? - Cut and diverted.
translation.ja: 電話は？ 通話は すべて指令車に回ってくる

translation.en: We're the only ones they're gonna call.
translation.ja: 通話は すべて指令車に回ってくる

translation.en: Cell phones are monitored, and we can jam the air whenever you say.
translation.ja: ケータイは全部 モニターし電波を妨害できる

translation.en: But we like to leave it clear in case a hostage is able to get through,
translation.ja: 人質からの電話はいつでも受けられるが―

translation.en: but so far nothing.
translation.ja: 人質からの電話はいつでも受けられるが― まだ入らない
119番は？ モニターしてて我々が受ける

translation.en: It's up on the screen. Any call about a bank gets routed straight to us.
translation.ja: モニターしてて我々が受ける

translation.en: Well...
translation.ja: 以上だ

translation.en: that's my end of it, Detective.
translation.ja: こっちはね

translation.en: Yeah, I'm not calling him yet.
translation.ja: 接触は まだ早い

translation.en: - Beg your pardon? - Doesn't feel right yet, you know what I mean?
translation.ja: まだ早い？ 時期尚早です

translation.en: I'm not gonna call and ask what I can do for him. Let's see what he does.
translation.ja: 奴らの出方を待ちましょう

translation.en: Your call.
translation.ja: 任せる

translation.en: Mr. Case, why don't you let me explain to you how I work?
translation.ja: 私のやり方を説明させて

translation.en: Please. That would be nice.
translation.ja: 伺おう

translation.en: Well, you say that there are family heirlooms
translation.ja: お話では― 銀行の貸金庫に ご一族の貴重品が保管されている

translation.en: inside your safety-deposit box.
translation.ja: 銀行の貸金庫に ご一族の貴重品が保管されている

translation.en: That's fine. But in my experience,
translation.ja: 銀行の貸金庫に ご一族の貴重品が保管されている そういう場合 大抵は担当の保管責任者がいて―

translation.en: people like you have people working for them
translation.ja: そういう場合 大抵は担当の保管責任者がいて―

translation.en: that handle these kinds of things. And when they can't,
translation.ja: そういう場合 大抵は担当の保管責任者がいて― 本人ではなく 担当者が我々に連絡するものです

translation.en: they don't call me, their people call me.
translation.ja: 本人ではなく 担当者が我々に連絡するものです

translation.en: So immediately I know that there's something in that box
translation.ja: 直接 相談されるのは― 誰にも知られたくない物だからです

translation.en: that you don't even want your closest aides to know about.
translation.ja: 誰にも知られたくない物だからです

translation.en: No problem with me. You tell me I don't need to know what's in that box, and I don't need to know.
translation.ja: 私に教えたくなければ知りたいとは思いません

translation.en: But if you tell me that it's a bunch of old baseball cards
translation.ja: でも それが古い野球カードで―

translation.en: and I find out that it's the launch codes for a nuclear missile,
translation.ja: その番号が核ミサイルの発射暗号なら―

translation.en: then let's just say we no longer have an agreement.
translation.ja: 協力は出来かねます

translation.en: - Have you finished? - Yes.
translation.ja: 以上かね？

translation.en: What's inside that box, young lady, has belonged to me since before you were born.
translation.ja: その物の所有者は この私だ君が生まれる前からね

translation.en: It's very valuable and poses no danger whatsoever to anyone.
translation.ja: 非常に貴重な物だが誰にも危険は及ぼさん

translation.en: Except to you. ( chuckles )
translation.ja: あなたには危険？

translation.en: Okay. Well first, there are men with guns in there, so I can't guarantee any results, agreed?
translation.ja: 相手は武装強盗ですから結果は保証できません

translation.en: - Of course. - All right.
translation.ja: もちろん

translation.en: Now what makes you think that they want to rob your box?
translation.ja: 犯人の狙いは その貸金庫？

translation.en: - I don't. - ( chuckles )
translation.ja: 違うだろう

translation.en: Why don't you tell me how you would like this to end then, hmm?
translation.ja: じゃ どういう結果をお望みなの？

translation.en: I'd prefer
translation.ja: 私の貸金庫に―

translation.en: that nobody ever touch my safe-deposit box--
translation.ja: 誰の手も触れさせたくないのだ

translation.en: not them, not you, not the authorities.
translation.ja: 強盗も　君も　警察もね

translation.en: And the sooner the situation ends, the happier I'll be.
translation.ja: 望むのは この事態の早急な終結だ　分かるね？

translation.en: - Is that specific enough for you? - No.
translation.ja: 望むのは この事態の早急な終結だ　分かるね？ いいえ

translation.en: The contents of that box...
translation.ja: 金庫の中の物は―

translation.en: are of great value to me,
translation.ja: 非常に大切な物で―

translation.en: so long as they remain my secret.
translation.ja: 私だけの秘密なのだ

translation.en: And if they're exposed?
translation.ja: 外部に知れたら？

translation.en: I'll face some difficult questions.
translation.ja: 私が苦境に立つ

translation.en: So it stays locked or it disappears.
translation.ja: 人目に触れさせない？

translation.en: Precisely. Can you make that happen?
translation.ja: その通り　頼めるかな？

translation.en: - Yes. - I hope so.
translation.ja: 頼むよ

translation.en: I have to say, I can't help but be skeptical.
translation.ja: 多少 不安だがね

translation.en: Whoever gave you my number got the same deal. Clearly they must have been satisfied.
translation.ja: 私の電話番号を教えた人は私を評価してたはずよ

translation.en: - Steve. - It's time for Steve-O.
translation.ja: スティーブ “スティーブ Ｏ(オー)” だ

translation.en: I came out here to take a look at the perimeter they laid out.
translation.ja: 周囲の通りをチェックしたら面白いものを見つけた

translation.en: Guess what I found? That hostage they let out
translation.ja: 周囲の通りをチェックしたら面白いものを見つけた 一味はペンキ職人を装ってたんだろ？

translation.en: - said these guys came in dressed like painters, right? - Yeah.
translation.ja: 一味はペンキ職人を装ってたんだろ？

translation.en: - Probably stolen. - Have 'em run it, check it for prints.
translation.ja: 盗難車だな 指紋を調べさせろ

translation.en: - Everybody on? - Yep, go ahead.
translation.ja: 掛けるぞ いつでも

translation.en: - Sure you got the right number? - Absolutely.
translation.ja: 正しい番号か？ もちろん

translation.en: Okay. Nothing yet.
translation.ja: 応答しない

translation.en: - We got video. - Let's have it.
translation.ja: 画像だ 見よう

translation.en: Frazier: Oh! What happened to that camera right there?
translation.ja: 消えたぞ

translation.en: Officer: Wait, hold on, hold on, hold on.
translation.ja: 待ってくれ

translation.en: Frazier: Here it is. That guy right there. It's like he blinds the camera with the flashlight.
translation.ja: あいつだ　閃光(せんこう)でカメラを眩(くら)ませた

translation.en: It's like nobody else sees it. You'd think it'd be pretty bright, no?
translation.ja: 強い閃光なのに誰も気づいてない

translation.en: - Could be infrared. - What's that?
translation.ja: 赤外線かも

translation.en: Infrared bulb. See, humans can't see it,
translation.ja: 赤外線は人の目に見えず―

translation.en: but a video camera will pick it up.
translation.ja: 防犯カメラの機能を潰せる

translation.en: - He could knock out the cameras without no one knowing. - Right.
translation.ja: 防犯カメラの機能を潰せる 赤外線か

translation.en: - He knocked out the cameras about 10:00. - So for approximately
translation.ja: 時間は “10：00時”と出てる それから約２分間―

translation.en: two minutes, we got no evidence of people leaving or entering the bank. That's great.
translation.ja: カメラは人の出入りを捉(とら)えてない

translation.en: Frazier: Miriam, how long were you there before it began?
translation.ja: ミリアム事件発生前から現場に？

translation.en: It was just a few minutes.
translation.ja: 数分前から

translation.en: Can you tell us what happened after the explosion and the smoke?
translation.ja: 爆発があって煙を見た後は？

translation.en: They just told us to put our heads down
translation.ja: “頭を下げて目を閉じてろ”と言われたわ

translation.en: and then close our eyes, and then, um,
translation.ja: “頭を下げて目を閉じてろ”と言われたわ その少し後で犯人の誰かが―

translation.en: I just remember one of them telling the others
translation.ja: その少し後で犯人の誰かが―

translation.en: to just go down and fix the cameras.
translation.ja: “カメラを潰せ”って 防犯カメラ？

translation.en: The video cameras? I don't know.
translation.ja: 防犯カメラ？ さあ…

translation.en: - Anything else you want to share with us? - No.
translation.ja: 他には？

translation.en: - You sure? - Yeah, I...
translation.ja: 何もない？

translation.en: Could you give us the names of the bank robbers?
translation.ja: 犯人の名前とか？

translation.en: - ( crying, laughing ) - I'm just messing with you.
translation.ja: 犯人の名前とか？ 冗談ですよ　大丈夫？

Big boy. Were you scared in there?

translation.en: - No. - Nothing?
translation.ja: ない

translation.en: - Nothing. - Don't they look suspicious to you? I mean, I would think that you would want to know who they are.
translation.ja: この面(つら)…誰だか知りたいだろ？

translation.en: - No. - Well, thank you very much.
translation.ja: よし　以上だ

translation.en: Hey, just out of curiosity, do you know anything about diamonds?
translation.ja: あんた ダイヤに詳しいか？

translation.en: Ah, a bit. What do you need?
translation.ja: 少しなら　なぜだ？

translation.en: What do you think a guy like me should pay for a diamond ring?
translation.ja: 俺にも買えるかな？

translation.en: Depends. How many carats? If you like, I could give you my nephew's number.
translation.ja: 石の大きさ次第だ　甥っ子がいいブツを世話するぜ

translation.en: - You'll get a very good deal. - What do you have on underneath?
translation.ja: 石の大きさ次第だ　甥っ子がいいブツを世話するぜ その下は？

translation.en: Excuse me?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: Underneath your painter's coat. What do you have on underneath?
translation.ja: その下に何を着てる？

translation.en: - Clothing. - Could you show us, please?
translation.ja: シャツよ 見せて

translation.en: You see, there's just you and one other woman that fit the physical description of the female suspect.
translation.ja: 犯人グループの女性の特徴にピッタシだ

translation.en: What's that?
translation.ja: どこが？

translation.en: That's your height, your age,
translation.ja: あんたの背丈…年令…

translation.en: - and your, um... - Your cup size.
translation.ja: それから… カップサイズ

translation.en: So I violated section 34-DD?
translation.ja: ＤＤカップは違法なわけ？

translation.en: That's what you're telling me?
translation.ja: そういうこと？

translation.en: How dumb do these morons have to be to think they're gonna get a plane?
translation.ja: ジャンボ機とはバカな要求だ

translation.en: - This guy's no moron. - I don't just mean him.
translation.ja: バカでは… 人質を取る奴は皆 バカさ

translation.en: Any hostage-taker.
translation.ja: 人質を取る奴は皆 バカさ

translation.en: Those ragheads at the Munich Olympics? Who the fuck ever got a plane?
translation.ja: ミュンヘン･オリンピックの犯人もジャンボを要求した

translation.en: Shit, and these days? This guy don't know that?
translation.ja: この時代に誰が応じる？

translation.en: - What you doin', there, Keith? - He wants a plane, I'm gonna give him a plane.
translation.ja: 何だ？ ジャンボを与える

translation.en: - What happened to playing it by the book? - That's what's bugging me.
translation.ja: 何だと？ 何か引っ掛かる奴は こっちの出方を読んでる

translation.en: It's like the other team read the book too, and they know exactly what we're gonna do.
translation.ja: 何か引っ掛かる奴は こっちの出方を読んでる

translation.en: This whole time, we're trying to stall him, right?
translation.ja: 我々の引き延ばし作戦は間違いだ

translation.en: Wrong. They're the ones that's stalling.
translation.ja: 引き延ばしてるのは奴(･)ら(･)だ―

translation.en: Think about it-- the bullshit questions, the Albanian thing.
translation.ja: あのクイズ…　アルバニア語…

translation.en: - So you're saying-- - I'm saying that he wants to give us more time.
translation.ja: あのクイズ…　アルバニア語… 奴らが時間稼ぎをしてる

translation.en: He makes demands. He gives us deadlines.
translation.ja: 要求を出して決めた期限を延長

translation.en: We stall, then he gives us more time.
translation.ja: 要求を出して決めた期限を延長 急いでいないってことだ

translation.en: - I don't think he's in a rush. - Why?
translation.ja: 急いでいないってことだ

translation.en: That's what I'm gonna find out.
translation.ja: 理由を知りたい

translation.en: ( phone ringing )
translation.ja: “備品室”

translation.en: - Yeah. - Your plane is ready.
translation.ja: 手配した

translation.en: - Is that a fact? - That's a fact.
translation.ja: ジャンボを？ まず私がそっちへ行って確かめたい

translation.en: But I'm gonna need to come in there
translation.ja: まず私がそっちへ行って確かめたい

translation.en: and make sure the hostages are okay.
translation.ja: 人質の無事をね

translation.en: You'll see them when they get on the bus.
translation.ja: バスで確認できる

translation.en: I just need to make sure you're not leaving any bodies behind.
translation.ja: 死体を残してるかもしれん

translation.en: Meet me at the front door.
translation.ja: 正面に来い

translation.en: - What the hell just happened? - You got to be crazy to go in there.
translation.ja: やった！ やめろ　ヤバい

translation.en: Down the stairs.
translation.ja: 降りろ

translation.en: - Gum? - Excuse me?
translation.ja: ガムは？

translation.en: - Would you like some gum? - No, thank you.
translation.ja: ガムを噛むか？ いや　結構

translation.en: Let me take the kid.
translation.ja: 子供は解放しろ

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: ダメだ

translation.en: Any more?
translation.ja: これで全員？

translation.en: There are some who misbehaved.
translation.ja: 騒いだ奴は こっちだ

translation.en: I'm gonna get you all out of here. I promise you.
translation.ja: もう少しの辛抱だ必ず助け出す

translation.en: The tour's over.
translation.ja: ツアーは以上だ

translation.en: - Can I ask you a question? - There's nothing to talk about.
translation.ja: 質問が… 話すことはない

translation.en: What were you planning on doing if you actually got the plane and the pilots, huh?
translation.ja: 飛行機をもらえたらどうする気だった？

translation.en: - Excuse me? - You don't want a plane. You never did.
translation.ja: 要求は口先だけだ

translation.en: Whoever heard of bank robbers escaping on a plane with 50 hostages?
translation.ja: 50人の人質と飛行機で逃げる？

translation.en: You saw Dog Day Afternoon. You're stalling.
translation.ja: 50人の人質と飛行機で逃げる？ 時間稼ぎをしてる

translation.en: Why, I don't know.
translation.ja: だが なぜ？

translation.en: What's the matter? You can't get into the safe?
translation.ja: 金庫が開かない？

translation.en: - Perhaps. - Ah.
translation.ja: かもな

translation.en: There's two ways out of this. The easy way, we walk out the front door together, or the hard boys cut the power,
translation.ja: 道は２つある　投降して俺と一緒に正面から出てくか

translation.en: hit you with the tear gas and come in strong through the glass.
translation.ja: 電源を切られ催涙ガスを浴びるか

translation.en: It's your choice. You don't want that. I don't want that.
translation.ja: 電源を切られ催涙ガスを浴びるか やりたくないが今夜 そうなる

translation.en: And you know, they'd like to do it tonight.
translation.ja: やりたくないが今夜 そうなる

translation.en: You got night vision? You got gas masks?
translation.ja: 暗視眼鏡とガスマスクが要るぞ

translation.en: Maybe.
translation.ja: そうだな

translation.en: - I'm this close to ordering it. - Let's cut the crap.
translation.ja: それが望みか？ ほ(･)ざ(･)く(･)な(･)犠牲者が出てなくて―

translation.en: First, you don't order an assault when no hostages have been killed
translation.ja: ほ(･)ざ(･)く(･)な(･)犠牲者が出てなくて― 危機的状況でもないんだぞ

translation.en: and there's no immediate threat.
translation.ja: 危機的状況でもないんだぞ

translation.en: Second, if it ends that way, whatever happens,
translation.ja: 万一　そんな結末で終われば―

translation.en: you don't get to be the hero. You want to bullshit me, try harder.
translation.ja: お前が非難を浴びるんだハッタリは よせ

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.ja: 行こう

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: I'll tell you what: My ass is covered, sport. But I would not get too comfortable in there if I were you.
translation.ja: 俺は援護されてるがあんたは長居すると危険だ

translation.en: No? I got the cable guy coming on Wednesday.
translation.ja: ケーブルテレビを引くつもりだ

translation.en: ( chuckles ) Why don't you just walk out the door?
translation.ja: ケーブルテレビを引くつもりだ 正面から出ろよ

translation.en: I will.
translation.ja: 出るとも

translation.en: I'm gonna walk out of that door when I'm good and ready.
translation.ja: そうすべき時が来たらね

translation.en: Can I get you to do that today?
translation.ja: 今日が その日では？

translation.en: - I didn't think so. - Any other proposals?
translation.ja: 違うか 他に提案(プロポーズ)は？

translation.en: Oh, please, do not say "proposals." My girlfriend, she wants a proposal from me.
translation.ja: その言葉はやめてくれ女にプロポーズを迫られてる

translation.en: You think you're too young to get married?
translation.ja: 結婚は早い？

translation.en: No, not too young, too broke. Maybe I should rob a bank.
translation.ja: 金がないんだよ俺も銀行に押し入ろうかな

translation.en: Do you love each other?
translation.ja: 愛し合ってる？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, we do.
translation.ja: ああ　愛してる

translation.en: Then money shouldn't really matter.
translation.ja: じゃ 金なんか

translation.en: Thank you, bank robber.
translation.ja: 強盗のせりふか？

translation.en: I'm just saying... money can't buy love.
translation.ja: “金で愛は買えない”ってことさ

translation.en: Thank you... very much.
translation.ja: なるほど　ありがとう

translation.en: I'm-- I'm learning so much today, you know?
translation.ja: なるほど　ありがとう 今日は いろいろ学んだ

translation.en: Look, why don't we go across the street to the Killarney Rose, huh?
translation.ja: 向かいのパブでお(･)ご(･)ろ(･)う(･)

translation.en: Forget about this dangerous hostage situation.
translation.ja: 事件を忘れてビールでも

translation.en: - I'll buy you a beer, my treat. - Thanks, Detective,
translation.ja: 事件を忘れてビールでも 誘いはうれしいが断る罠だと怖いからね

translation.en: but, uh, I'm trying to stay away from bars, if you know what I mean.
translation.ja: 誘いはうれしいが断る罠だと怖いからね

translation.en: Well, if you change your mind, there's still a standing offer, all right?
translation.ja: いつか気が向いたら

translation.en: Cell block or the graveyard? Prison whites or a toe tag?
translation.ja: 選べ！　ムショか 墓場か！囚人服か 死体用の名札か！

translation.en: - Make up your mind! Ticktock, ticktock. - Hey! Hey!
translation.ja: 選べ！　ムショか 墓場か！囚人服か 死体用の名札か！ おい！　待て！

translation.en: - ( weapon cocks ) - We done?
translation.ja: おい！　待て！ 動くな！

translation.en: You just crossed the fucking line.
translation.ja: 行き過ぎだぞ

translation.en: Buses, Kojak, parked outside.
translation.ja: バスを用意しろ

translation.en: You think I'm bluffing, you roll the dice and see what happens.
translation.ja: 口先だけの要求だと？どうなるか見てるがいい

translation.en: - So what's up? - Got him right where I want him.
translation.ja: やったぞ

translation.en: - Yeah? Where's that? - Right behind me with my pants around my ankles,
translation.ja: やったぞ 言いなりになると思い込ませた

translation.en: - but it's a start. - Jesus Christ.
translation.ja: 言いなりになると思い込ませた

translation.en: - What the fuck, man? He got the drop on you. - How long?
translation.ja: 奴に隙を見せたのか？

translation.en: - What if he saw your face? What if I didn't have my gun? - Two, maybe three hours.
translation.ja: 顔を見られたら？ ２,３時間で完成だ

translation.en: You know, you're letting this cop get too fucking close.
translation.ja: あのデカを近づけ過ぎてる

translation.en: What happened?
translation.ja: それで？

translation.en: I gave him every excuse to blow my brains out.
translation.ja: 挑発しても手を出さない

translation.en: He doesn't bite. Why? He ain't the type.
translation.ja: なぜか？　人を殺す気がない

translation.en: Let's just sit back and think about this for a second.
translation.ja: 振り出しから考えよう

translation.en: We know that they planned this whole thing-- the tape, the cameras, the costumes.
translation.ja: これは奴らが立てた計画で―

translation.en: There was a game plan, but it never included airplanes. He's up to something, but it ain't violence.
translation.ja: 飛行機や流血は計画にないじゃ何が狙いだ？

translation.en: - I'm listening. How's the reception?
translation.ja: 何だ？ 受信状態は？

translation.en: - Excuse me? - The camera on the truck. Give me a close-up on the second-floor window.
translation.ja: 車の屋根のカメラで２階の窓をズームしろ

translation.en: - Walt. - I'm on it, I'm on it.
translation.ja: 今 すぐ…

translation.en: Keith! Keith!
translation.ja: キース！　待て！

translation.en: What are you doing? What the fuck are you doing?
translation.ja: 何しやがる！

translation.en: You mean beyond the obvious?
translation.ja: これで分かったろ？

translation.en: That's what I mean. Come on, this ain't no bank robbery!
translation.ja: 本当の狙いを言え！

translation.en: This is your fault. I told you to get the buses.
translation.ja: バスを手配しないからだ

translation.en: Fuck you! I didn't kill anybody!
translation.ja: クソッ！ 俺の責任か？

translation.en: I've got 50 more people in here. You fuck with me again, I'll give you two of the longest days of your life.
translation.ja: 人質は後 50人いる長い悪夢の２日間になるぞ

translation.en: Right, all right. Look, just tell me what it is
translation.ja: 人質は後 50人いる長い悪夢の２日間になるぞ 本当の狙いを言ったらその通りにする　約束する

translation.en: you really want, and I'll get it for you, I promise.
translation.ja: 本当の狙いを言ったらその通りにする　約束する

translation.en: I've told you: two buses, a plane.
translation.ja: バス２台とジャンボだ

translation.en: Right right right. And box seats behind home plate at Yankee Stadium. Come on. Don't bullshit a bullshitter.
translation.ja: ヤンキー･スタジアムのネット裏の特等席もか？

translation.en: You planned every inch of this thing right from the start, and you got everybody marching to your beat, including me,
translation.ja: 我々を計画通りに踊らせたつもりだろうが―

translation.en: and I'm through buying it.
translation.ja: 我々を計画通りに踊らせたつもりだろうが― もう乗らんぞ！

translation.en: You're too damn smart to be a cop.
translation.ja: デカにしちゃ 利口な男だとっとと消えろ！

translation.en: - Now, get the fuck out of here. - You gonna shoot me?
translation.ja: デカにしちゃ 利口な男だとっとと消えろ！ 撃たないのか？

translation.en: Do it. Shit, you got nothing to lose. I damn sure got nothing to lose. So shoot me. Do it.
translation.ja: お互い 失うものは何もないだろ？　早く撃て

translation.en: - Shoot me. - Fuck you.
translation.ja: 撃て！ 消えろ！

translation.en: Tell 'em to send someone sane over here.
translation.ja: イカれてないデカと代われ

translation.en: - Man: Hello? - We got a big problem.
translation.ja: お手上げだ

translation.en: Hey, Detective, this ain't your day.
translation.ja: あなたの厄日ですね

translation.en: How you doin', Captain?
translation.ja: やあ 部長

translation.en: - Look, I know you put your trust in me, and I... - Well, you're a good cop.
translation.ja: 精一杯… 君ほどの刑事はめったにいないが 一緒に心中はできん

translation.en: I need more like you. But if you're going down on this one, I can't go with you.
translation.ja: 君ほどの刑事はめったにいないが 一緒に心中はできん

translation.en: - You've got to understand-- - No no no no.
translation.ja: でも 部長… 俺は すべて順調だと思いベッドに入った

translation.en: Let me just tell you what my problem is. Okay? I go to bed, everything's hunky-dory,
translation.ja: 俺は すべて順調だと思いベッドに入った

translation.en: I get a call at 3:15 and there's, what, a dead hostage.
translation.ja: 夜中に電話　犠牲者が出た

translation.en: - Right right right. But I can end this thing... - It is ended.
translation.ja: 夜中に電話　犠牲者が出た 交代だ

translation.en: See, you think I got options. I got to answer to the Chief of Ds.
translation.ja: こうするほかない本部長に どう説明する？

translation.en: Darius is calling the shots on this. That's it.
translation.ja: ダリウスと交代だ

translation.en: - What'd he say? - That's it.
translation.ja: 何て？ 交代だ

translation.en: Shit!
translation.ja: クソッ！

translation.en: - It's a tactical nightmare. - I know.
translation.ja: 最悪です

translation.en: First, this is the only way in.
translation.ja: 突入口はここだけで―

translation.en: Then we got to make it up the stairs blind.
translation.ja: 敵の目にさらされた階段を登る

translation.en: Once we get up there, we're right out in the open.
translation.ja: 奴らは物陰に身を隠して―

translation.en: They have the advantage of cover.
translation.ja: 奴らは物陰に身を隠して― 我々を狙い撃ちできる

translation.en: They can pick us off like sitting ducks.
translation.ja: 我々を狙い撃ちできる

translation.en: And if we make it across the floor and down the stairs,
translation.ja: ここを切り抜けても相手を見分けてるうちに―

translation.en: we still can't tell the homies from the good guys until they shoot at us.
translation.ja: ここを切り抜けても相手を見分けてるうちに― 撃ち殺される

translation.en: Even if it isn't rigged with explosives, it's still a fucking nightmare.
translation.ja: 爆薬を仕掛けてる可能性も

translation.en: Let's not forget the possibility of hostages being killed.
translation.ja: 人質の命を守るんだ

translation.en: Darius: Well, our best hope is to separate the hostages.
translation.ja: 犯人どもを人質から離して―

translation.en: - If we can get two or three upstairs and take 'em out. - Kill 'em.
translation.ja: ２階に追い上げて始末しよう 始末？

translation.en: Gun gun gun!
translation.ja: 撃つぞ！　食らえ！

translation.en: What if there's more than four?
translation.ja: ホシは？ ペンキ職人の格好の奴はその可能性がある

translation.en: Yeah, well, that's what's so nuts about it. Anybody in a painter suit could be a perp.
translation.ja: ペンキ職人の格好の奴はその可能性がある

translation.en: Maybe we should dress our guys up like a bunch of painters.
translation.ja: 警官もペンキ職人の服を着れば？

translation.en: And we should use rubber bullets. Take head shots. Put their lights out.
translation.ja: ゴム弾を頭に撃ち込み失神させる

translation.en: - Not a bad idea. - Yeah.
translation.ja: 名案だ

translation.en: Rubber bullets it is, baby.
translation.ja: ゴム弾で行こう

translation.en: This goes down wrong, they're gonna dump this whole mess in your lap, you know.
translation.ja: 事件の収拾に失敗したらお前が責任をとらされる

translation.en: - I'm making first grade. - What?
translation.ja: 昇進するよ

translation.en: I'm making detective first grade. Things ain't all they appear to be.
translation.ja: 物事は見かけと違うから

translation.en: - Fuck does that mean? - Detective first grade, Keith Fray-zhah!
translation.ja: “第一級刑事キース･フレイジャー”だ！

translation.en: - Are you fucking kidding me? - Yes!
translation.ja: 気は確かか？

translation.en: Thank the mayor and our mystery guest for that.
translation.ja: 市長と謎のレディーの お陰だ

translation.en: You cut a deal with those guys?
translation.ja: ２人と取り引きを？

translation.en: "Never make first grade." Shit.
translation.ja: 昇進してやるとも！

translation.en: Worked too hard to let that happen. Everybody's getting theirs, I'm gonna get mine.
translation.ja: シャカリキに働いたんだ見返りはもらうぞ

translation.en: I'll be outside.
translation.ja: 外に出てる

translation.en: ( exhales ) What a day, what a day.
translation.ja: ツイてない日だ

translation.en: Detective, they're gonna storm that bank without you? It's not right.
translation.ja: あなたが外されるなんてひどい

translation.en: So tell me about the kid who pointed the gun at you. The 12-year-old.
translation.ja: 12才の子が銃を突きつけた？

translation.en: - Now? - Yeah.
translation.ja: その話？

translation.en: Last year, up in the 33rd. I was breaking up a fight about a half a block from the high school.
translation.ja: 去年 高校の近くでガキ同士のケンカを止めた

translation.en: This one little Spic is getting his clock cleaned by another one--
translation.ja: 殴られてたのはスペ公

translation.en: Do me a favor, Sergeant. Just tone down the color commentary.
translation.ja: 人種差別表現は抑えとけ

translation.en: So, I bust up the fight, I turn around, and this kid is pointing a .22 at my chest.
translation.ja: ケンカを止めて振り向いたらガキが22口径を向けてた

translation.en: Is that right? Now, which kid was this?
translation.ja: ガキ？　どんな？

translation.en: Another kid, a n-- an African-American.
translation.ja: アフリカ系… アメリカ人

translation.en: African-American. Oh, yeah.
translation.ja: アフリカ系アメリカ人

translation.en: - He came out of nowhere. I didn't see him. - So what'd you do?
translation.ja: 突然 現れた それで？

translation.en: What did I do then? I'll tell you what I did then.
translation.ja: それで？　教えましょう

translation.en: I got shot in the fucking chest. That's what I did then.
translation.ja: 胸にも(･)ろ(･)一発食らったんです

translation.en: So you'll pardon my euphemisms, Detective,
translation.ja: この若さで命を散らすより―

translation.en: but I would rather wind up an old bigot than a handsome young corpse.
translation.ja: この若さで命を散らすより― 人種偏見を持って長生きしたい

translation.en: No offense, Detective, but I'm just trying to keep them away from us.
translation.ja: 悪い連中は片づけちまわないと

translation.en: Now, what do you say we just get these people safely out of the bank?
translation.ja: まずは人質の救出です

translation.en: - I hear that. - And, uh,
translation.ja: そうだな それに―

translation.en: I'll try to watch what I say in the future. You never know who's listening.
translation.ja: 盗み聞きする人間にも用心しなきゃね

translation.en: - What are you doing? - Jesus! Shit!
translation.ja: 何だ？ 見ろ　チクショー！

translation.en: They bugged us. They bugged us.
translation.ja: 盗聴器だ　盗聴されてた

translation.en: Darius! Darius, don't make a move!
translation.ja: ダリウス！ 中止しろ！
